      public void sendMessageToClient(String message, PlayerController myPlayer)
      This method choose which method with the same to call according to player connection type
      指定者:
      sendMessageToClient 在接口中 ICommunication
      参数:
      message - message to send to client
      myPlayer - player controller of the receiver

      指定者:

      参数:

      value - true if the method return true, otherwise false
